findings.message:
Reentrancy in yVault.deposit(uint256) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#326-339):
	External calls:
	- token.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#329)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#338)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#110)
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#338)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#109)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in yVault.deposit(uint256) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#326-339):
	External calls:
	- token.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#329)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(address(0),account,amount) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#111)
		- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (../..0xacd43e627e64355f1861cec6d3a6688b31a6f952.sol#338)
findings.name: reentrancy-events
